name: Together My Headers
description:
Together My Headers is a single-play VR puzzle adventure game.
You become a huge spirit and help a small character.
Help them away from their friends to meet other friends and find their way home.

Characters automatically move along the road.
Please remove obstacles that block the road by hand.
When you're wandering around because you can't see the road, look around.

Six kinds of unique characters wait for you.
Use character's skills to find your way.
Pat the character with your hands.
